subject: Speech in Noise Test...
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
I am sure someone here has posted this link, but I found it good 
practice in learning to hear words within audio.  ;)

Here is the link to a page.  Click on the "Speech in Noise" link and 
give it a try.  You'll need shockwave to do it.  If you don't have 
Shockwave, it will install for you at that time.
http://bfc.positscience.com/eval/ 

LC
